title: Nike mens NSW Club Open Hem Pants
description: CLASSIC AND COMFORTABLE: These Nike sweatpants for men are a closet staple with a classic style and a comfortable feel. Perfect for an elevated, everyday look.
SOFT COMFORT: These men's sweatpants were constructed with a brushed-back fleece fabric. The Nike sweatpants create a feel that is both soft and smooth.
PERSONALIZED FIT: These Nike joggers for men have an elastic waistband with an adjustable drawcord which allows you personalize the fit for any activity.
OPEN HEM: These sweatpants for men have an open hem that allows the pants to rest comfortably over shoes allowing for maximum movement.
NIKE MENS SWEATPANTS: Imported, fabric: 80% cotton / 20% polyester
